title: NFL Draft Day 2 Reaction: Winners/Losers, Making sense of Jalen Hurts to the Eagles (Football 4/25)
description:
Rounds 2 and 3 of the 2020 NFL Draft are in the books as we get a better sense of how draft classes are shaping up. There were some obvious selections and some pretty blatant surprises, headlined by the Eagles selecting quarterback Jalen Hurts #53 overall. We attempt to offer reasoning behind that head-scratching pick. Plus, Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and Josh Edwards all offer their Day 2 draft winners & losers.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, Bullhorn and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @EdwardsCBS
